content: Two-tool cordless combos Two tools cordless combos ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Power tool combo kits ### FEATURES:Features High capacity batteries for the best run time Soft bag with durable and water-resistant ballistic poly-nylon construction NO COST wear and tear coverage for tools, batteries and chargers Unlimited battery replacements for 2 years or more for fleet tools Tools designed to increase productivity by delivering corded performance Applications Professional level work on any jobsite All in one solution for a set of trade applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3863699 - SID 6 + SD 5000-22 Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 6-22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x Belt hook cordless - 1x SD 5000-22 ROW Cordl. dryw. screwdr. - 1x S-B PH2 25/1 IF Driver bit - 1x S-BH M 50/2 Bit holder - 1x Depth gauge - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 2x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3554456 - SF 6H-A22 + SIW 6AT-22 CPC ADV CMPCT COMBO - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 6H-A22 02 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x SIW 6AT-A22 Cordl. imp. wrench assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 1x Impact socket 1/2-15/16 shallow - 1x Impact socket S-NSD 1/2-15/16 deep - 2x B 22/4.0 Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3536729 - SF 2H-A & SID 2-A - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 2x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x S Soft Pouch - 3554455 - SF 6H-A22 +SID 4-A22 CPC ADV CMPCT COMBO - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 6H-A22 02 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x SID 4-A22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 2x B 22/4.0 Battery pack - 1x Universal KIT Tool case assy - 3868244 - SF4H-22 + SID 4-22 + B22 55 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 4-22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x Belt hook cordless - 1x SF 4H-22 (02) Cordl. drill driver - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 2x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 3554481 - SFC & SID 4-A22 ADV CMPCT COMBO - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 4-A22 ATC Cordl. drill driver - 1x SID 4-A22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 2x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 22/4.0 Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3554473 - SID 4-A22 + SL 6-A22 CPC COMBO - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 4-A22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x SL 6-A22 Cordl. area light - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 1x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 22/4.0 Battery pack - 1x Universal KIT Tool case assy
